title: Anma nEya orumai
sahitya:
Anma nEya orumai taruvAyE paramA aruT-perum jyOtiyAi varuvAyE


anupallavi

  jnAna cir-sabhaiyilE jnAlamellAm kUDi nalam pera sattiya sanmArga nilai pera


caraNam 1    paranda tanikkaruNai surandu surandu mAndar piranda piNigaLara maranda poruLaip-pera
sirandaduriya nilai uraindu mArip-pirindu tirandu cir-sabhaiyilE uraindu magizhndiDavE
    caraNam 2    jIva tattuvam shiva sattuvam AghavE janana maraNa bhayam sidaittu pOghavE
dEvarAi bhuviyinil yAvarum vAzhavE tiruvaruL ATSiyum kATSiyum shUzhavE
